node.detail_zh: 患者無外遊紀錄，7 月 17 日出現症狀，由檢疫中心送院，與第 #2086 宗個案患者有關連。
node.detail_en: The patient has no recent travel history, started having symptoms on July 17, and was transferred to hospital from the quarantine centre. His case is epidemiologically related to the case of patient #2086.
node.classification_zh: 本地個案的密切接觸者

groups.name_en:
Tsz Wan Shan Shopping
Centre Deluxe Cuisine
groups.description_zh: 慈雲山中心 7 樓百匯軒酒樓有員工及食客確診。
groups.description_en: Employees and guests of the restaurant Deluxe Cuisine on the 7th floor of Tsz Wan Shan Shopping Centre have tested positive.

node.location_en: Ching Wo House, Tsz Ching House
